biotools.summary:
Cytomorph is a open software based on the main general features of cytoneme-meditated gradient formation. 

This software allows to upload different experimental data to study in silico the role of different biological parameters of this type of signaling. 

Cytomorph can also work as an in silico tester for other biological hypotheses that are difficult to validate experimentally.
